title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Simulation/VR Utilization for Collaborative and Distributed Learning Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience with knowledge management systems within organizations
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute virtual team projects using collaboration platforms (Miro, Notion, etc.) within four weeks
Learners can improve knowledge-sharing processes within organizations by applying distributed learning models in VR simulation environments
By the end of the six-month course, learners can operate cloud-based knowledge management systems (Confluence, etc.) in BYOD environments to enhance team performance by over 20%
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
